entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gameti
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:30 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gameti Airport 08:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %

Wind: NE 11 km/h

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 41. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
